original_text: And the counsel of Ahithophel, which he counselled in those days, was as if a man had enquired at the oracle of God: so was all the counsel of Ahithophel both with David and with Absalom.
korean_text: 그 때에 아히도벨이 베푸는 계략은 사람이 하나님께 물어서 받은 말씀과 같은 것이라 아히도벨의 모든 계략은 다윗에게나 압살롬에게나 그와 같이 여겨졌더라

sentences.original_text: which he counselled in those days
was as if a man had enquired
so was all the counsel of Ahithophel
both with David and with Absalom.
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 함께 그리고 압살롬과 함께 모두 그러하였다.
